description.narrative: Financial Resources and Stewardship: Financial resources are acquired for commitments and efficiently managed to support realization of results.

mailing-address.narrative: 31st Floor Yuchengco Tower Rizal Commercial Banking Corporation (RCBC) Plaza 6819 Ayala Avenue corner Gil Puyat Avenue Makati City

sector.narrative: Country programme process (including UNDAF planning and CCA)
Digital learning materials and ICT in education
Management and Operations support at CO

description.narrative: Development Partner affairs policy planning and administration

Philippines United Nations Development Assistance Framework 2019-2023

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Financial Resources and Stewardship: Financial resources are acquired for commitments and efficiently managed to support realization of results.

description.narrative: In 2018, the office's total cash assistance was valued at USD9.5million for 67 implementing partners versus USD6.5million for 74 partners in 2017. The office was successful in meeting its assurance targets for both programme visits and financial spot checks . At yearend no cash assistance was outstanding greater than 9months. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/01/2019

actual.value: 2016:Target largely met with 30 of 31 reports submitted on time (1 report was 1 day late).

title.narrative: Public and Private sector fundraising strategy developed

actual.value: 2016:For PFP, over Php 253 million raised in 2016 or 89% of 2016 planned income.
2016:Bank reconciliation statements for PCO's five (5) accounts are completed on/before the required deadlines

title.narrative: Within established policies and financial procedures, funds timely made available throughout the year without interruption to office needs

target.value: 2018:100% office cash requirement are met within the two week treshold for cash availability

actual.value: 2016:With very few exceptions, the right amount of funds are available when needed within targeted levels.
2016:DCT Management remains a challenge. Active follow up required by PMT and CMT in order to fully achieve planned results.

title.narrative: Expenditure rates are monthly monitored in CMT

actual.value: 2016:Targets partially met. Particular CMT focus was made on expiring grants. Overall expenditure rate is 64%, with SB at 79%, RR at 64%, ORE at 68%, and ORR at 61%

target.value: 2018:Monthly reconciliation to clear all outstanding amounts

actual.value: 2016:Monthly and year-end closure reporting requirements are completed on/before the required deadlines

target.value: 2018:Procurement action taken within 7 days of receipt of procurement request for delivery, at most 2 weeks for local procurement and 4 months for offshore procurement.

actual.value: 2016:Targets mostly met. The office significantly improved its performance in the supply component of the Country Programme by improving contracting for institutional services, warehousing and in-country delivery to end users
